foreignNames.name: Аватара Пробуждающего Солнца
foreignNames.text: Когда Аватара Пробуждающего Солнца выходит на поле битвы, если вы разыграли ее из вашей руки, уничтожьте все не являющиеся Динозаврами существа.
foreignNames.flavor: «Когда солнце показывается из-за горизонта, ласковые лучи Кинхалли возвещают о рождении новой жизни». — Читлати, наездница молний

foreignNames.name: 晓阳化身
foreignNames.text: 当晓阳化身进战场时，若你从你手上施放之，则消灭所有非恐龙的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「太阳破晓时，津加理光芒笼罩万物，召引新生。」 ～迅雷龙骑奇拉蒂

foreignNames.name: 曉陽化身
foreignNames.text: 當曉陽化身進戰場時，若你從你手上施放之，則消滅所有非恐龍的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「太陽破曉時，津加理光芒籠罩萬物，召引新生。」 ～迅雷龍騎奇拉蒂

cards.originalText: When Wakening Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.

cards.name: Air Elemental
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: As the ship approached, the jade totem rose high overhead. Power rippled. Eyes of stone glowed and crackled. Out hissed a breath of the world, and a windstorm came alive.

foreignNames.name: Luftelementar
foreignNames.text: Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: Mit dem herannahenden Schiff erhob sich auch das Jade-Totem hoch in die Lüfte. Seine Macht erwachte. Steinerne Augen begannen zu glühen. Der Atem der Welt entwich und erschuf einen Windsturm.

foreignNames.name: Elemental de aire
foreignNames.text: Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: Mientras el barco se acercaba, el tótem de jade se elevó en el cielo. El poder se anudó en torno a él como un remolino. Los ojos de piedra centellearon. Entonces, el mundo exhaló un soplido y surgió un huracán.

foreignNames.name: Élémental d'air
foreignNames.text: Vol
foreignNames.flavor: À l'approche du navire, le totem de jade s'éleva haut dans les airs, libérant son pouvoir. Ses yeux de pierre s'éclairèrent et crépitèrent. Le souffle du monde se fit entendre et un vent de tempête se leva soudain.

foreignNames.name: Elementale dell'Aria
foreignNames.text: Volare
foreignNames.flavor: All'avvicinarsi della nave, il totem di giada si innalzò nel cielo. Il suo potere riverberò nell'aria e i suoi occhi di pietra brillarono crepitando. Il respiro del mondo sibilò attraverso di esso e un vento di tempesta prese vita.

foreignNames.name: 大気の精霊
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル
foreignNames.flavor: 船が近づくと、翡翠のトーテム像が頭上高く現れた。力の波動を感じた。石の目が光り緊張が高まった。それが息を一吹きすると、暴風が巻き起こった。

foreignNames.name: 공기의 정령
foreignNames.text: 비행
foreignNames.flavor: 배가 다가가자, 비취 토템이 머리 위로 높이 떠올랐다. 힘이 물결쳤다. 암석의 눈이 빛나며 우지직 소리를 냈다. 거대한 숨을 내쉬자, 폭풍이 일어났다.

foreignNames.name: Elemental do Ar
foreignNames.text: Voar
foreignNames.flavor: Quando a embarcação se aproximou, o totem de jade alçou-se. Houve uma ondulação de poder. Olhos de pedra brilharam e crepitaram. Dele sibilou um sopro do mundo, e uma tormenta ganhou vida.

foreignNames.name: Элементаль Воздуха
foreignNames.text: Полет
foreignNames.flavor: Когда корабль приблизился к берегу, высоко в небо поднялся нефритовый тотем. Воздух задрожал от сгустившейся мощи. Каменные глаза засияли, затрещали разряды. С шумом вырвалось дыхание мира, и яростный ураган ожил.

foreignNames.name: 大气元素
foreignNames.text: 飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 随着船只逐渐靠近，翠玉图腾像呼啸升空。其间能量涌动，石像眼睛突然发光、碎裂，叹出一口世间气息，一股风暴就此成型。

foreignNames.name: 大氣元素
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.flavor: 隨著船隻逐漸靠近，翠玉圖騰像呼嘯升空。其間能量湧動，石像眼睛突然發光、碎裂，歎出一口世間氣息，一股風暴就此成型。

cards.originalText: Flying

cards.name: Arcane Adaptation
cards.text:
As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

rulings.text: Replacement effects that modify creatures of a certain type as they enter the battlefield will apply after you apply Arcane Adaptation’s effect. This is a change from previous rules. If you control Arcane Adaptation and the Aether Revolt card Metallic Mimic, with the same creature type chosen for both, then any creature you control will enter the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

To choose a creature type, you must choose an existing creature type, such as Vampire or Knight. You can’t choose multiple creature types, such as “Vampire Knight.” Card types such as artifact can’t be chosen, nor can subtypes that aren’t creature types, such as Jace, Vehicle, or Treasure.

foreignNames.name: Arkane Adaption
foreignNames.text:
Sowie die Arkane Adaption ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Kreaturentyp.
Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen den bestimmten Typ. Das Gleiche gilt für Kreaturenzauber, die du kontrollierst, und Kreaturenkarten, die du besitzt und die nicht im Spiel sind.

foreignNames.name: Adaptación arcana
foreignNames.text:
En cuanto la Adaptación arcana entre al campo de batalla, elige un tipo de criatura.
Las criaturas que controlas son del tipo elegido además de sus otros tipos. Lo mismo sucede con los hechizos de criatura que controlas y con las cartas de criatura de las que eres propietario que no están en el campo de batalla.

foreignNames.name: Adaptation ésotérique
foreignNames.text:
Au moment où l'Adaptation ésotérique arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez un type de créature.
Les créatures que vous contrôlez ont le type choisi en plus de leurs autres types. C'est vrai aussi pour les sorts de créature que vous contrôlez et les cartes de créature que vous possédez qui ne sont pas sur le champ de bataille.

foreignNames.name: Adattamento Arcano
foreignNames.text:
Mentre l'Adattamento Arcano entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un tipo di creatura.
Le creature che controlli hanno il tipo scelto in aggiunta ai loro altri tipi. Lo stesso vale per le magie creatura che controlli e le carte creatura che possiedi e che non sono sul campo di battaglia.

foreignNames.name: 秘儀での順応
foreignNames.text:
秘儀での順応が戦場に出るに際し、クリーチャー・タイプ１つを選ぶ。
あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーは、それらの他のタイプに加えてその選ばれたタイプでもある。あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー・呪文と、あなたがオーナーである戦場にないクリーチャー・カードについても同様である。

foreignNames.name: 신비한 적응
foreignNames.text:
신비한 적응이 전장에 들어오면서, 생물 유형 한 가지를 선택한다.
당신이 조종하는 생물들은 자신의 다른 유형에 더불어 당신이 선택한 유형이다. 당신이 조종하는 생물 주문과 당신이 소유한 생물 카드 중 전장에 없는 카드도 마찬가지다.

foreignNames.name: Adaptação Arcana
foreignNames.text:
Conforme Adaptação Arcana entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um tipo de criatura.
As criaturas que você controla são do tipo escolhido além de seus outros tipos. O mesmo vale para mágicas de criatura que você controla e cards de criatura que você possua e não estejam no campo de batalha.

foreignNames.name: Магическая Адаптация
foreignNames.text:
При выходе Магической Адаптации на поле битвы выберите тип существа.
Существа под вашим контролем обладают выбранным типом в дополнение к своим другим типам. То же самое относится к заклинаниям существ под вашим контролем и картам существ, которыми вы владеете и которые не находятся на поле битвы.

foreignNames.name: 玄秘适境
foreignNames.text:
于玄秘适境进战场时，选择一种生物类别。
由你操控的生物均额外具有该类别。由你操控的生物咒语和由你拥有且不在战场上的生物牌也额外具有该类别。

foreignNames.name: 玄秘適境
foreignNames.text:
於玄秘適境進戰場時，選擇一種生物類別。
由你操控的生物均額外具有該類別。由你操控的生物咒語和由你擁有且不在戰場上的生物牌也額外具有該類別。

cards.originalText:
As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren't on the battlefield.

cards.name: Cancel
cards.text: Counter target spell.
cards.flavor:
"Hold your fire, obviously."
—Captain Brandis Thorn

foreignNames.name: Abbrechen
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl.
foreignNames.flavor: „Stellt das Feuer ein oder wir tun es für Euch." —Kapitän Brandis Dorn

foreignNames.name: Deshacer
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "No creo que haga falta decirlo: no disparen". —Capitán Brandis Espina

foreignNames.name: Révocation
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé.
foreignNames.flavor: « Cessez le feu, bien sûr. » —Capitaine Brandis Espine

foreignNames.name: Eliminare
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Cessate il fuoco, ovviamente." —Capitano Brandis Pugno di Spine

foreignNames.name: 取り消し
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。
foreignNames.flavor: 「撃ち方やめ。ってことだ。」 ――棘針船長ブランディス

foreignNames.name: 주문 취소
foreignNames.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "보면 알겠지만, 포격을 멈춰." —브랜디스 쏜 선장

foreignNames.name: Cancelar
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Cessar fogo, obviamente." — Capitão Brandis Espinho

foreignNames.name: Отмена
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание.
foreignNames.flavor: «Не стреляй, ясное дело». — капитан Брандис Шип

foreignNames.name: 取消
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 「别开炮，你自己瞧瞧。」 ～布兰迪竦恩船长

foreignNames.name: 取消
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 「別開炮，你自己瞧瞧。」 ～布蘭迪竦恩船長

cards.originalText: Counter target spell.

cards.name: Chart a Course
cards.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: While other pirates prowl for treasure, Captain Parrish plunders secrets.

foreignNames.name: Den Kurs festlegen
foreignNames.text: Ziehe zwei Karten. Wirf dann eine Karte ab, es sei denn, du hast in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen.
foreignNames.flavor: Während andere Piraten nach Schätzen suchen, verlangt es Kapitän Parrish nur nach Geheimnissen.

foreignNames.name: Trazar la ruta
foreignNames.text: Roba dos cartas. Luego descarta una carta a menos que hayas atacado con una criatura este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Mientras que otros piratas van por ahí buscando tesoros, la capitana Parrish descubre secretos.

foreignNames.name: Tracer un cap
foreignNames.text: Piochez deux cartes. Ensuite, défaussez-vous d'une carte à moins que vous n'ayez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: Tandis que les autres pirates cherchent des trésors, la capitaine Parrish s'empare de secrets.

foreignNames.name: Tracciare la Rotta
foreignNames.text: Pesca due carte. Poi scarta una carta a meno che tu non abbia attaccato con una creatura in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Mentre altri pirati razziano tesori, la Capitana Parrish saccheggia segreti.

foreignNames.name: 航路の作成
foreignNames.text: カードを２枚引く。その後、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していないかぎりカード１枚を捨てる。
foreignNames.flavor: 他の海賊が宝物を探している間に、船長パリッシュは秘密を略奪する。

foreignNames.name: 진로 계획
foreignNames.text: 카드 두 장을 뽑는다. 그 후 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격하지 않았다면 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 다른 해적들이 보물을 찾아 돌아다니는 동안, 패리시 선장은 비밀을 약탈한다.

foreignNames.name: Traçar uma Rota
foreignNames.text: Compre dois cards. Em seguida, descarte um card, a menos que tenha atacado com uma criatura neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Enquanto outros piratas espreitam tesouros, a Capitã Parrish saqueia segredos.

foreignNames.name: Проложить Курс
foreignNames.text: Возьмите две карты. Затем сбросьте карту, если только вы не атаковали существом в этом ходу.
foreignNames.flavor: Остальные пираты охотятся за сокровищами, а капитан Пэрриш похищает секреты.

foreignNames.name: 规划航路
foreignNames.text: 抓两张牌。然后除非你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，否则弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 其他海盗看上的是财宝，芭丽许船长盯上的是秘密。

foreignNames.name: 規劃航路
foreignNames.text: 抽兩張牌。然後除非你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，否則棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 其他海盜看上的是財寶，芭麗許船長盯上的是秘密。

cards.originalText: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked with a creature this turn.

cards.name: Daring Saboteur
cards.text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: "They'll never see me coming."

rulings.text: Activating the first ability of Daring Saboteur after it has become blocked won't cause it to become unblocked.

foreignNames.name: Wagemutige Saboteurin
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}: Die Wagemutige Saboteurin kann in diesem Zug nicht geblockt werden.
Immer wenn die Wagemutige Saboteurin einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kannst du eine Karte ziehen. Falls du dies tust, wirf eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie rechnen niemals mit mir."

foreignNames.name: Saboteadora osada
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}: La Saboteadora osada no puede ser bloqueada este turno.
Siempre que la Saboteadora osada haga daño de combate a un jugador, puedes robar una carta. Si lo haces, descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "No me verán venir ni de lejos".

foreignNames.name: Saboteuse audacieuse
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U} : La Saboteuse audacieuse ne peut pas être bloquée ce tour-ci.
À chaque fois que la Saboteuse audacieuse inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, vous pouvez piocher une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ils ne me verront jamais arriver. »

foreignNames.name: Sabotatrice Audace
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}: La Sabotatrice Audace non può essere bloccata in questo turno.
Ogniqualvolta la Sabotatrice Audace infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, puoi pescare una carta. Se lo fai, scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non mi vedranno neanche arrivare."

foreignNames.name: 勇敢な妨害工作員
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}：このターン、勇敢な妨害工作員はブロックされない。
勇敢な妨害工作員がプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはカードを１枚引いてもよい。そうしたなら、カード１枚を捨てる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「気づかれる前にやるわよ。」

foreignNames.name: 대담한 파괴공작원
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}: 대담한 파괴공작원은 이 턴에 방어될 수 없다.
대담한 파괴공작원이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 버린다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내가 오는 걸 절대 모를 거야."

foreignNames.name: Sabotadora Ousada
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}: Sabotadora Ousada não pode ser bloqueada neste turno.
Toda vez que Sabotadora Ousada causa dano de combate a um jogador, você pode comprar um card. Se fizer isso, descarte um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eles nem vão me ver chegar."

foreignNames.name: Дерзкая Диверсантка
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}: Дерзкая Диверсантка не может быть заблокирована в этом ходу.
Каждый раз, когда Дерзкая Диверсантка наносит боевые повреждения игроку, вы можете взять карту. Если вы это делаете, сбросьте карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Им ни за что меня не заметить».

foreignNames.name: 大胆破坏者
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}：大胆破坏者本回合不能被阻挡。
每当大胆破坏者对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。若你如此作，则弃一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他们绝想不到我会出现。」

foreignNames.name: 大膽破壞者
foreignNames.text:
{2}{U}：大膽破壞者本回合不能被阻擋。
每當大膽破壞者對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，你可以抽一張牌。若你如此作，則棄一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他們絕想不到我會出現。」

cards.originalText:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Deadeye Quartermaster
cards.text: When Deadeye Quartermaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: "Welcome aboard, mate! You're going to need this."

foreignNames.name: Fahlaugen-Quartiermeisterin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Fahlaugen-Quartiermeisterin ins Spiel kommt, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer Ausrüstung- oder Fahrzeug-Karte durchsuchen, sie offen vorzeigen, auf deine Hand nehmen und dann deine Bibliothek mischen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Willkommen an Bord, Matrose! Das hier wirst du brauchen."

foreignNames.name: Intendente de la Perfidia
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Intendente de la Perfidia entre al campo de batalla, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca una carta de Equipo o Vehículo, mostrarla, ponerla en tu mano y luego barajar tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: "¡Bienvenido a bordo, compañero! Necesitarás esto".

foreignNames.name: Quartier-maître morne-œil
foreignNames.text: Quand la Quartier-maître morne-œil arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'équipement ou de véhicule, la révéler, la mettre dans votre main et mélanger ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: « Bienvenue à bord, matelot ! Tu vas avoir besoin de ça. »

foreignNames.name: Quartiermastro dell'Occhio Cieco
foreignNames.text: Quando il Quartiermastro dell'Occhio Cieco entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Equipaggiamento o Veicolo, rivelarla, aggiungerla alla tua mano e poi rimescolare il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Benvenuto a bordo, mozzo! Prendi, ti servirà."

foreignNames.name: 巧射艦隊の操舵手
foreignNames.text: 巧射艦隊の操舵手が戦場に出たとき、あなたは「自分のライブラリーから装備品か機体であるカード１枚を探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。」を選んでもよい。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「よく来たね、新入り。これを持っておきな。」

foreignNames.name: 데드아이 보급대장
foreignNames.text: 데드아이 보급대장이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 당신의 서고에서 장비 또는 탑승물 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개한 후, 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "승선을 환영하네, 친구! 이게 필요할 거야."

foreignNames.name: Contramestre da Olho Morto
foreignNames.text: Quando Contramestre da Olho Morto entra no campo de batalha, você pode procurar um card de Equipamento ou Veículo em seu grimório, revelá-lo, colocá-lo na sua mão e depois embaralhar seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: "Boas-vindas a bordo, colega! Você vai precisar disso."

foreignNames.name: Старшина Зоркой Флотилии

foreignNames.name: 必达舰队军需官

foreignNames.flavor: 「欢迎登舰，伙计！这个你会用得上的。」

foreignNames.name: 必達艦隊軍需官

foreignNames.flavor: 「歡迎登艦，伙計！這個你會用得上的。」

cards.originalText: When Deadeye Quartermaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Deeproot Waters
cards.text: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor: A visit to the Deeproot Tree and its ancient spring replenishes a merfolk's connection to nature.

rulings.text: The ability of Deeproot Waters resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Urwurzel-Gewässer

foreignNames.flavor: Ein Besuch beim Urwurzel-Baum und seiner uralten Quelle erneuert die Verbindung des Meervolks zur Natur.

foreignNames.name: Aguas de Raizprofunda
foreignNames.text: Siempre que lances un hechizo de Tritón, crea una ficha de criatura Tritón azul 1/1 con la habilidad de antimaleficio. (Una criatura con la habilidad de antimaleficio no puede ser objetivo de hechizos o habilidades que controlen tus oponentes.)

foreignNames.name: Eaux de Plongeracine

foreignNames.name: Acque di Fondalinfa

foreignNames.name: 深根の水域

foreignNames.name: 깊은뿌리의 물

cards.name: Entrancing Melody
cards.text: Gain control of target creature with mana value X.
cards.flavor: The stronger the will, the more bewitching the song.

rulings.text: If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
The control-change effect of Entrancing Melody lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step.
In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well, and any effects that give the player control of permanents immediately end.

cards.name: Fleet Swallower
cards.text: Whenever Fleet Swallower attacks, target player mills half their library, rounded up.
cards.flavor: "Captain, I think that island is following us."

rulings.text: Fleet Swallower’s triggered ability can target any player, not just the player it’s attacking.

If two Fleet Swallowers attack, each trigger determines the top half of that player’s library separately. For example, if the target player has fifteen cards in their library, that player puts the top eight cards into the graveyard, then puts the top four cards into the graveyard.

cards.name: Jace, Cunning Castaway
cards.text:
[+1]: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.
[−2]: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it."
[−5]: Create two tokens that are copies of Jace, Cunning Castaway, except they're not legendary.

rulings.text: The delayed triggered ability created by Jace’s first ability can trigger more than once in a turn if creatures you control deal combat damage at different times in a turn (most likely because one or more has first strike) or if creatures you control deal combat damage to more than one player at once.

If a token created by Jace’s second ability becomes the target of a spell, its ability triggers and goes on the stack on top of that spell. The ability will resolve first (causing the token to be sacrificed). Unless the spell has another target, it will then be countered when it tries to resolve for having no legal targets.

The tokens from Jace’s last ability copy exactly what is printed on Jace and nothing else. They don’t copy how many counters are on him or Auras attached to him, or any non-copy effects that have changed his color or types, and so on. They’ll each enter the battlefield with three loyalty counters. You can activate one loyalty ability of each of the tokens this turn.
The tokens created by Jace’s last ability don’t have the legendary supertype. If another object becomes a copy of the token, that copy also won’t be legendary.
You can control one legendary Jace, Cunning Castaway in addition to any number of nonlegendary copies of Jace, Cunning Castaway.

cards.name: Kopala, Warden of Waves
cards.text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to cast.
Abilities your opponents activate that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to activate.
cards.flavor: "I know these waters better than you know yourselves."

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of an opponent’s spell that targets a Merfolk you control, start with the mana cost or alternative cost that player is paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.
Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].”
Kopala’s abilities won’t affect triggered abilities (starting with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) that target a Merfolk you control.
Spells and abilities that target more than one Merfolk you control cost only {2} more to cast or activate.

cards.name: Navigator's Ruin
cards.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked this turn, target opponent mills four cards.
cards.flavor: "You won't be needing this. Or this. Or these . . ."

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

Some raid abilities trigger at the beginning of your end step. These abilities trigger if you attacked with a creature that turn, even if the card with that raid ability wasn’t on the battlefield when you attacked.

cards.name: Perilous Voyage
cards.text: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its mana value was 2 or less, scry 2.
cards.flavor: For the first time in her life, Vraska tried to prevent death.

rulings.text: If the target permanent is an illegal target by the time Perilous Voyage resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t scry.
Use the permanent’s converted mana cost as it existed on the battlefield to determine whether you scry.
If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.

There are many important moments in the story, but the most crucial—called “story spotlights”—are shown on cards. These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

foreignNames.text: Bringe eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist und die du nicht kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Falls ihre umgewandelten Manakosten 2 oder weniger betrugen, wende Hellsicht 2 an.
foreignNames.flavor: Zum ersten Mal in ihrem Leben versuchte Vraska, einen Tod zu verhindern.

foreignNames.name: Travesía peligrosa
foreignNames.text: Regresa el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra que no controles a la mano de su propietario. Si su coste de maná convertido era de 2 o menos, adivina 2.
foreignNames.flavor: Por primera vez en su vida, Vraska intentó evitar la muerte.

foreignNames.name: Voyage périlleux
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez un permanent non-terrain ciblé que vous ne contrôlez pas dans la main de son propriétaire. Si son coût converti de mana était inférieur ou égal à 2, regard 2.
foreignNames.flavor: Pour la première fois de sa vie, Vraska tenta d'empêcher un décès.

foreignNames.name: Viaggio Pericoloso
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare un permanente non terra bersaglio che non controlli in mano al suo proprietario. Se il suo costo di mana convertito era pari o inferiore a 2, profetizza 2.
foreignNames.flavor: Per la prima volta nella sua vita, Vraska cercò di impedire la morte di qualcuno.

foreignNames.name: 危険な航海
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしておらず土地でもないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。それの点数で見たマナ・コストが２以下であったなら、占術２を行う。
foreignNames.flavor: 生まれて初めて、ヴラスカは死を阻もうとした。

foreignNames.name: 위험한 항해
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하지 않는 대지가 아닌 지속물을 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 그 지속물의 전환마나비용이 2 이하라면, 점술 2를 한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 브라스카는 난생처음으로 죽음을 막으려고 시도했다.

foreignNames.name: Viagem Perigosa
foreignNames.text: Devolva a permanente alvo que você não controla que não seja um terreno para a mão de seu dono. Se seu custo de mana convertido era igual ou inferior a 2, use vidência 2.
foreignNames.flavor: Pela primeira vez na vida, Vraska tentou evitar a morte de alguém.

foreignNames.name: Опасное Путешествие
foreignNames.text: Верните целевой не являющийся землей перманент, который не находится под вашим контролем, в руку его владельца. Если его конвертированная мана-стоимость была 2 или меньше, предскажите 2.
foreignNames.flavor: В первый раз за всю свою жизнь Враска пыталась предотвратить смерть.

foreignNames.name: 险恶旅程
foreignNames.text: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。如果其总法术力费用等于或小于2，则占卜2。
foreignNames.flavor: 这是瓦丝卡有生以来第一次想要救人活命。

foreignNames.name: 險惡旅程
foreignNames.text: 將目標不由你操控的非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。如果其總魔法力費用等於或小於2，則占卜2。
foreignNames.flavor: 這是瓦絲卡有生以來第一次想要救人活命。

cards.originalText: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand. If its converted mana cost was 2 or less, scry 2.

cards.name: Pirate's Prize
cards.text: Draw two cards. Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor: Nothing warms the heart like plunder.

foreignNames.name: Piratenbeute
foreignNames.text: Ziehe zwei Karten. Erzeuge einen farblosen Schatz-Artefaktspielstein mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
foreignNames.flavor: Wer meint, Reichtum allein mache nicht glücklich, ist ein Narr.

foreignNames.name: Recompensa pirata
foreignNames.text: Roba dos cartas. Crea una ficha de artefacto Tesoro incolora con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: Nada es tan satisfactorio como el pillaje.

foreignNames.name: Butin de pirate
foreignNames.text: Piochez deux cartes. Créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».
foreignNames.flavor: Rien ne réchauffe le cœur autant qu'un bon butin.

foreignNames.name: Bottino dei Pirati
foreignNames.text: Pesca due carte. Crea una pedina artefatto Tesoro incolore con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: Niente scalda l'anima come il saccheggio.

foreignNames.name: 海賊の獲物
foreignNames.text: カードを２枚引く。「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ生成する。
foreignNames.flavor: 略奪ほど心温まるものはない。

foreignNames.name: 해적질의 보상
foreignNames.text: 카드 두 장을 뽑는다. "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 약탈만큼 가슴을 따뜻하게 해 주는 것은 없다.

foreignNames.name: Prêmio do Pirata
foreignNames.text: Compre dois cards. Crie uma ficha de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: Nada acalenta o coração como a pilhagem.

foreignNames.name: Трофей Пирата
foreignNames.text: Возьмите две карты. Создайте одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Ничто так не греет сердце, как награбленное.

foreignNames.name: 海盗的奖赏
foreignNames.text: 抓两张牌。派出一个无色珍宝衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 什么都比不上劫夺来得暖心。

foreignNames.name: 海盜的獎賞
foreignNames.text: 抽兩張牌。派出一個無色珍寶衍生神器，且具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 什麼都比不上劫奪來得暖心。

cards.originalText: Draw two cards. Create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Prosperous Pirates
cards.text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor: The floating city of High and Dry hasn't yet sunk under the weight of gold, but it's not for want of trying.

foreignNames.name: Erfolgreiche Piraten
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Erfolgreichen Piraten ins Spiel kommen, erzeuge zwei farblose Schatz-Artefaktspielsteine mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
foreignNames.flavor: Der Hafen am Ende der Welt wurde noch nicht durch das Gewicht des Goldes versenkt, trotz der Bemühungen der Piraten.

foreignNames.name: Piratas prósperos
foreignNames.text: Cuando los Piratas prósperos entren al campo de batalla, crea dos fichas de artefacto Tesoro incoloras con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: La ciudad flotante de Zabordada aún no se hundió bajo el peso del oro, pero no será por falta de intentos.

foreignNames.name: Pirates prospères
foreignNames.text: Quand les Pirates prospères arrivent sur le champ de bataille, créez deux jetons d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».
foreignNames.flavor: La Rade, la cité flottante, n'a pas encore sombré sous le poids de l'or, mais ce n'est pas faute d'essayer.

foreignNames.name: Pirati Facoltosi
foreignNames.text: Quando i Pirati Facoltosi entrano nel campo di battaglia, crea due pedine artefatto Tesoro incolori con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: La città galleggiante della Secca non è ancora sprofondata sotto il peso dell'oro, ma non certo per mancanza di impegno.

foreignNames.name: 裕福な海賊
foreignNames.text: 裕福な海賊が戦場に出たとき、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを２つ生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 浮遊都市孤高街は、黄金の重さで沈むには至っていないが、そのための努力が足りていないわけではない。

foreignNames.name: 번창한 해적
foreignNames.text: 번창한 해적이 전장에 들어올 때, "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 부유도시 하이 앤 드라이는 아직 금의 무게 때문에 가라앉지는 않았지만, 노력이 부족해서 그런 것은 아니다.

foreignNames.name: Piratas Prósperos
foreignNames.text: Quando Piratas Prósperos entrar no campo de batalha, crie duas fichas de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: A cidade flutuante de Banco de Areia ainda não afundou com o peso do ouro, mas não foi por falta de tentativa.

foreignNames.name: Удачливые Пираты
foreignNames.text: Когда Удачливые Пираты выходят на поле битвы, создайте две фишки бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: Плавучий Город-на-Мели пока еще не затонул под весом золота, но это точно не от недостатка старания.

foreignNames.name: 丰获海盗
foreignNames.text: 当丰获海盗进战场时，派出两个无色珍宝衍生神器，它们具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 虽然已竭尽所能，但海盗们还是没办法用黄金将水上之都绝涛城沉入海底。

foreignNames.name: 豐獲海盜
foreignNames.text: 當豐獲海盜進戰場時，派出兩個無色珍寶衍生神器，它們具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 雖然已竭盡所能，但海盜們還是沒辦法用黃金將水上之都絕濤城沈入海底。

cards.originalText: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: River Sneak
cards.text:
River Sneak can't be blocked.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, River Sneak gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: No ripples, no splashes, no warning.

foreignNames.name: Flussschleicherin
foreignNames.text:
Die Flussschleicherin kann nicht geblockt werden.
Immer wenn ein anderes Meervolk unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, erhält die Flussschleicherin +1/+1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Weder Wellen noch Luftblasen warnen dich vor ihr.

foreignNames.name: Escurridiza ribereña
foreignNames.text:
La Escurridiza ribereña no puede ser bloqueada.
Siempre que otro Tritón entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, la Escurridiza ribereña obtiene +1/+1 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Sin burbujas, sin salpicaduras... sin aviso.

foreignNames.name: Rôdeuse du fleuve
foreignNames.text:
La Rôdeuse du fleuve ne peut pas être bloquée.
À chaque fois qu'un autre ondin arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, la Rôdeuse du fleuve gagne +1/+1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Aucun bruit, aucune éclaboussure, aucun avertissement.

foreignNames.name: Furtiva del Fiume
foreignNames.text:
La Furtiva del Fiume non può essere bloccata.
Ogniqualvolta un altro Tritone entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, la Furtiva del Fiume prende +1/+1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Né increspature, né spruzzi, né avvertimenti.

foreignNames.name: 川潜み
foreignNames.text:
川潜みはブロックされない。
他のマーフォークが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、ターン終了時まで、川潜みは＋１/＋１の修整を受ける。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・戦士
foreignNames.flavor: 細波も立てず、飛沫も上げず、予測できない。

foreignNames.name: 강 기습꾼
foreignNames.text:
강 기습꾼은 방어될 수 없다.
다른 인어가 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 강 기습꾼은 턴종료까지 +1/+1을 받는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 물결도 없고, 첨벙거리는 소리도 없으며, 경고도 없다.

foreignNames.name: Furtiva do Rio
foreignNames.text:
Furtiva do Rio não pode ser bloqueada.
Toda vez que outro Tritão entra no campo de batalha sob seu controle, Furtiva do Rio recebe +1/+1 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Sem ondulações, sem borrifos, sem aviso.

foreignNames.name: Речная Скрытница
foreignNames.text:
Речная Скрытница не может быть заблокирована.
Каждый раз, когда другой Мерфолк выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, Речная Скрытница получает +1/+1 до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Ни ряби, ни всплеска, ни предупреждения.

foreignNames.name: 河流偷袭客
foreignNames.text:
河流偷袭客不能被阻挡。
每当另一个人鱼在你的操控下进战场时，河流偷袭客得+1/+1直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 没有涟漪，没有水花，没有警告。

foreignNames.name: 河流偷襲客
foreignNames.text:
河流偷襲客不能被阻擋。
每當另一個人魚在你的操控下進戰場時，河流偷襲客得+1/+1直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 沒有漣漪，沒有水花，沒有警告。

River Sneak can't be blocked.
Whenever another Merfolk enters the battlefield under your control, River Sneak gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: River's Rebuke
cards.text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.
cards.flavor: Carefully following the thaumatic compass Bolas had given her, Vraska blundered straight into the River Heralds' trap.

rulings.text: There are many important moments in the story, but the most crucial—called “story spotlights”—are shown on cards. These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

foreignNames.name: Zurückweisung des Flusses
foreignNames.text: Bringe alle bleibenden Karten, die keine Länder sind und die ein Spieler deiner Wahl kontrolliert, auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Vraska folgte genau dem Thaumaturgischen Kompass, den sie von Bolas erhalten hatte, und stolperte blindlings in die Falle der Flussherolde.

foreignNames.name: Rechazo torrencial
foreignNames.text: Regresa todos los permanentes que no sean tierra y que controla el jugador objetivo a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Siguiendo cuidadosamente el astrolabio taumatúrgico que Nicol Bolas le había dado, Vraska cayó en la trampa de los Heraldos del Río.

foreignNames.name: Blâme du fleuve
foreignNames.text: Renvoyez tous les permanents non-terrain que le joueur ciblé contrôle dans la main de leur propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Se fiant aveuglément au compas thaumaturgique que lui avait confié Bolas, Vraska tomba tête baissée dans le piège des Hérauts de l'onde.

foreignNames.name: Sdegno del Fiume
foreignNames.text: Fai tornare tutti i permanenti non terra controllati da un giocatore bersaglio in mano ai rispettivi proprietari.
foreignNames.flavor: Intenta a seguire la bussola taumaturgica ricevuta da Bolas, Vraska finì dritta nella trappola degli Araldi del Fiume.

foreignNames.name: 川の叱責
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしていて土地でないパーマネントをすべてオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.flavor: ボーラスが与えた魔学コンパスに注意深く従っていたはずが、ヴラスカは川守りの罠に真正面から嵌った。

foreignNames.name: 강의 질책
foreignNames.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어가 조종하는 대지가 아닌 모든 지속물을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 볼라스에게 받은 마법구동 나침반을 따라 조심스럽게 이동하던 브라스카는 강 전령이 준비한 함정으로 들어가는 실수를 범했다.

foreignNames.name: Repreensão do Rio
foreignNames.text: Devolva todas as permanentes que o jogador alvo controla que não sejam terrenos para a mão de seus donos.
foreignNames.flavor: Vraska seguiu com precisão a bússola taumática que Nicol Bolas lhe dera, e caiu perfeitamente na armadilha dos Arautos do Rio.

foreignNames.name: Возражение Реки
foreignNames.text: Верните все не являющиеся землями перманенты под контролем целевого игрока в руки их владельцев.
foreignNames.flavor: Точно следуя указаниям полученного от Боласа колдовского компаса, Враска попала прямо в ловушку Речных Вестников.

foreignNames.name: 河流拒斥
foreignNames.text: 将由目标牌手操控的所有非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 瓦丝卡小心翼翼地按照波拉斯给她的奇术罗盘指引前行，却径直闯入了川流使设下的陷阱。

foreignNames.name: 河流拒斥
foreignNames.text: 將由目標玩家操控的所有非地永久物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 瓦絲卡小心翼翼地按照波拉斯給她的奇術羅盤指引前行，卻直接闖入了川流使設下的陷阱。

cards.originalText: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

cards.name: Run Aground
cards.text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor:
"That's the first time I've seen the ground do the running."
—Captain Brinely Rage

foreignNames.name: Auf Grund laufen
foreignNames.text: Lege ein Artefakt oder eine Kreatur deiner Wahl oben auf die Bibliothek seines bzw. ihres Besitzers.
foreignNames.flavor: „Worauf sollte man auch sonst laufen?" —Kapitänin Brinella Rage

foreignNames.name: Encallar
foreignNames.text: Pon la criatura o artefacto objetivo en la parte superior de la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "Es la primera vez que veo que la tierra encalla en el barco". —Capitana Furia Salada

foreignNames.name: Échouage
foreignNames.text: Mettez l'artefact ciblé ou la créature ciblée au-dessus de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: « C'est la première fois que je vois la terre provoquer un échouage. » —Capitaine Brinely Furor

foreignNames.name: Arenare
foreignNames.text: Metti un artefatto o una creatura bersaglio in cima al grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: "È la prima volta che vedo la costa incastrarsi di proposito sotto la chiglia." —Capitana Brinely la Furiosa

foreignNames.name: 座礁
foreignNames.text: アーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上に置く。
foreignNames.flavor: 「地面が走るのなんて初めて見たわ。」 ――激怒船長ブリネリー

foreignNames.name: 좌초
foreignNames.text: 마법물체나 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 목표를 소유자의 서고 맨 위에 놓는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "땅이 달리는 모습을 본 건 그때가 처음이었어." —브라인리 레이지 선장

foreignNames.name: Encalhar
foreignNames.text: Coloque o artefato ou a criatura alvo no topo do grimório de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: "Essa é a primeira vez em que eu vejo a terra correr para o marinheiro." — Capitã Fúria Salmoura

foreignNames.name: Выбросить на Берег
foreignNames.text: Положите целевой артефакт или существо на верх библиотеки его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: «Впервые в жизни я вижу, как берег набрасывается на корабль». — капитан Бурун Раж

foreignNames.name: 搁浅
foreignNames.text: 将目标神器或生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这是我第一次见识到大地的威力。」 ～伯莱莉雷极船长

foreignNames.name: 擱淺
foreignNames.text: 將目標神器或生物置於其擁有者的牌庫頂。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這是我第一次見識到大地的威力。」 ～伯萊莉雷極船長

cards.originalText: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Sailor of Means
cards.text: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
cards.flavor: In the Brazen Coalition, the wheels of business are greased with plunder.

foreignNames.name: Begüterter Seemann
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Begüterte Seemann ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen farblosen Schatz-Artefaktspielstein mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
foreignNames.flavor: In der Tollkühnen Koalition laufen die Geschäfte besser, wenn man mit etwas Gold nachhilft.

foreignNames.name: Marinero con recursos
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Marinero con recursos entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de artefacto Tesoro incolora con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".
foreignNames.flavor: Para la Coalición Azófar, el saqueo es la grasa que hace girar las ruedas de cualquier negocio.

foreignNames.name: Riche marin
foreignNames.text: Quand le Riche marin arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton d'artefact incolore Trésor avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve ».
foreignNames.flavor: Au sein de la Coalition des hardis, les affaires tournent grâce aux rapines.

foreignNames.name: Marinaio Benestante
foreignNames.text: Quando il Marinaio Benestante entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina artefatto Tesoro incolore con "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".
foreignNames.flavor: Nell'Alleanza di Bronzo, i saccheggi sono il carburante che alimenta il motore dell'economia.

foreignNames.name: 財力ある船乗り
foreignNames.text: 財力ある船乗りが戦場に出たとき、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンを１つ生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 鉄面連合では、略奪が商売の潤滑剤だ。

foreignNames.name: 재력가 선원
foreignNames.text: 재력가 선원이 전장에 들어올 때, "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 브레이즌 연합에서는 모든 사업이 약탈을 통해 돌아간다.

foreignNames.name: Marinheiro de Posses
foreignNames.text: Quando Marinheiro de Posses entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: Na Coalizão Brônzea, as engrenagens dos negócios são azeitadas com a pilhagem.

foreignNames.name: Разбогатевший Моряк
foreignNames.text: Когда Разбогатевший Моряк выходит на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку бесцветного артефакта Клад со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».
foreignNames.flavor: В Бравом Союзе шестеренки дел хорошенько подмазывают награбленной добычей.

foreignNames.name: 通天水手
foreignNames.text: 当通天水手进战场时，派出一个无色珍宝衍生神器，且具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 出海掠夺为莽霸联盟的商业发展提供助力。

foreignNames.name: 通天水手
foreignNames.text: 當通天水手進戰場時，派出一個無色珍寶衍生神器，且具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 出海掠奪為莽霸聯盟的商業發展提供助力。

cards.originalText: When Sailor of Means enters the battlefield, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Search for Azcanta // Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1. Then if you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.)
cards.flavor: The Sunken Ruin houses all the learning of a long-forgotten age.

rulings.text: If a seventh card is put into your graveyard by something other than resolving Search for Azcanta’s triggered ability, you won’t transform it yet. You’ll have to wait until your next upkeep.

If you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta while resolving its triggered ability even if you choose not to put the top card of your library into your graveyard.

If you don’t put the top card of your library into your graveyard while resolving Search for Azcanta’s triggered ability, you’ll leave it on top of your library (and probably draw it during your draw step).
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Suche nach Azcanta // Azcanta, die versunkene Ruine
foreignNames.text: Schaue dir zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie auf deinen Friedhof legen. Falls sich dann sieben oder mehr Karten in deinem Friedhof befinden, kannst du die Suche nach Azcanta transformieren.
foreignNames.flavor: Die versunkenen Ruinen beherbergen all das Wissen längst vergangener Tage.

foreignNames.name: En busca de Azcanta // Vestigios Sumergidos de Azcanta
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes ponerla en tu cementerio. Luego, si tienes siete o más cartas en tu cementerio, puedes transformar En busca de Azcanta.
foreignNames.flavor: Los Vestigios Sumergidos acumulan todos los conocimientos de una era olvidada tiempo ha.

foreignNames.name: À la recherche d'Azcanta // Azcanta, les Ruines englouties
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre dans votre cimetière. Ensuite, si vous avez au moins sept cartes dans votre cimetière, vous pouvez transformer À la recherche d'Azcanta.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Ruines englouties abritent toutes les connaissances d'une ère oubliée depuis longtemps.

foreignNames.name: In Cerca di Azcanta // Azcanta, le Rovine Sommerse
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi metterla nel tuo cimitero. Poi, se hai sette o più carte nel tuo cimitero, puoi trasformare In Cerca di Azcanta.
foreignNames.flavor: Le Rovine Sommerse custodiscono tutto il sapere di un'epoca da tempo dimenticata.

foreignNames.name: アズカンタの探索 // 水没遺跡、アズカンタ
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそれをあなたの墓地に置いてもよい。その後、あなたの墓地にカードが７枚以上あるなら、あなたはアズカンタの探索を変身させてもよい。
foreignNames.flavor: 水没遺跡には、長く忘れられていた時代の知識が詰まっている。

foreignNames.name: 아즈칸타 탐색 // 가라앉은 유적 아즈칸타
foreignNames.text: 당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드를 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 무덤에 넣을 수 있다. 그 후 당신의 무덤에 카드가 일곱 장 이상 있다면, 당신은 아즈칸타 탐색을 변신시킬 수 있다.
foreignNames.flavor: 가라앉은 유적에는 오래전에 잊혀진 시대의 모든 지식이 보관되어 있다.

foreignNames.name: Busca por Azcanta // Azcanta, a Ruína Submersa
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocá-lo em seu cemitério. Em seguida, se tiver sete ou mais cards em seu cemitério, você pode transformar Busca por Azcanta.
foreignNames.flavor: A Ruína Submersa abriga toda a erudição de uma era há muito esquecida.

foreignNames.name: Поиски Асканты // АСКАНТА, ЗАТОНУВШИЕ РУИНЫ
foreignNames.text: В начале вашего шага поддержки посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ее на ваше кладбище. Затем, если у вас на кладбище не менее семи карт, вы можете трансформировать Поиски Асканты.
foreignNames.flavor: В Затонувших Руинах покоятся все знания давно забытой эпохи.

foreignNames.name: 探寻阿兹坎特 // 沉没废墟阿兹坎特
foreignNames.text: 在你的维持开始时，检视你的牌库顶牌。你可以将其置入你的坟墓场。然后如果你的坟墓场中有七张或更多牌，则你可以转化探寻阿兹坎特。
foreignNames.flavor: 久被遗忘的年代中流传的所有学识，皆尽藏于这处「沉没废墟」之中。

foreignNames.name: 探尋阿茲坎特 // 沉沒廢墟阿茲坎特
foreignNames.text: 在你的維持開始時，檢視你的牌庫頂牌。你可以將其置入你的墳墓場。然後如果你的墳墓場中有七張或更多牌，則你可以轉化探尋阿茲坎特。
foreignNames.flavor: 久被遺忘的年代中流傳的所有學識，皆盡藏於這處「沉沒廢墟」之中。

cards.originalText: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard. Then if you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta.

cards.name: Search for Azcanta // Azcanta, the Sunken Ruin
cards.text:
(Transforms from Search for Azcanta.)
{T}: Add {U}.
{2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: If a seventh card is put into your graveyard by something other than resolving Search for Azcanta’s triggered ability, you won’t transform it yet. You’ll have to wait until your next upkeep.

If you have seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Search for Azcanta while resolving its triggered ability even if you choose not to put the top card of your library into your graveyard.

If you don’t put the top card of your library into your graveyard while resolving Search for Azcanta’s triggered ability, you’ll leave it on top of your library (and probably draw it during your draw step).
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Suche nach Azcanta // Azcanta, die versunkene Ruine
foreignNames.text:
(Transformierte Suche nach Azcanta.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {U}.
{2}{U}, {T}: Schaue dir die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst davon eine Karte, die weder eine Kreatur noch ein Land ist, offen vorzeigen und sie auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: En busca de Azcanta // Vestigios Sumergidos de Azcanta
foreignNames.text:
(Se transforma de En busca de Azcanta.)
{T}: Agrega {U} a tu reserva de maná.
{2}{U}, {T}: Mira las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Puedes mostrar una carta que no sea tierra ni criatura que se encuentre entre ellas y ponerla en tu mano. Pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.

foreignNames.name: À la recherche d'Azcanta // Azcanta, les Ruines englouties
foreignNames.text:
(Transformation d'À la recherche d'Azcanta.)
{T} : Ajoutez {U} à votre réserve.
{2}{U}, {T} : Regardez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez révéler une carte non-créature non-terrain parmi elles et la mettre dans votre main. Mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans l'ordre de votre choix.

foreignNames.name: In Cerca di Azcanta // Azcanta, le Rovine Sommerse
foreignNames.text:
(Si trasforma da In Cerca di Azcanta.)
{T}: Aggiungi {U} alla tua riserva di mana.
{2}{U}, {T}: Guarda le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Puoi rivelare una carta non terra, non creatura scelta tra esse e aggiungerla alla tua mano. Metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.

foreignNames.name: アズカンタの探索 // 水没遺跡、アズカンタ
foreignNames.text:
（アズカンタの探索から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{U}を加える。
{2}{U}, {T}：あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを４枚見る。あなたはその中からクリーチャーでも土地でもないカード１枚を公開してあなたの手札に加えてもよい。残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。

foreignNames.name: 아즈칸타 탐색 // 가라앉은 유적 아즈칸타
foreignNames.text:
(아즈칸타 탐색에서 변신함)
{T}: {U}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{2}{U}, {T}: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 본다. 당신은 그 중에서 생물이 아니고 대지가 아닌 카드 한 장을 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 나머지 카드들은 당신이 원하는 순서로 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓는다.

foreignNames.name: Busca por Azcanta // Azcanta, a Ruína Submersa
foreignNames.text:
(Transformação de Busca por Azcanta.)
{T}: Adicione {U} à sua reserva de mana.
{2}{U}, {T}: Olhe os quatro cards do topo do seu grimório. Você pode revelar um card que não seja de criatura nem de terreno dentre eles e colocá-lo em sua mão. Coloque o restante no fundo de seu grimório em qualquer ordem.

foreignNames.name: Поиски Асканты // АСКАНТА, ЗАТОНУВШИЕ РУИНЫ
foreignNames.text:
(Трансформируется из Поисков Асканты.)
{T}: добавьте {U} в ваше хранилище маны.
{2}{U}, {T}: посмотрите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Вы можете показать находящуюся среди них не являющуюся существом или землей карту и положить ее в вашу руку. Положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.

foreignNames.name: 探寻阿兹坎特 // 沉没废墟阿兹坎特
foreignNames.text:
（由探寻阿兹坎特转化。）
{T}：加{U}到你的法术力池中。
{2}{U}，{T}：检视你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以展示其中一张非生物且非地的牌，并将其置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

foreignNames.name: 探尋阿茲坎特 // 沉沒廢墟阿茲坎特
foreignNames.text:
（由探尋阿茲坎特轉化。）
{T}：加{U}到你的魔法力池中。
{2}{U}，{T}：檢視你牌庫頂的四張牌。你可以展示其中一張非生物且非地的牌，並將其置於你手上。將其餘的牌以任意順序置於你牌庫底。

cards.originalText:
(Transforms from Search for Azcanta.)
{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{2}{U}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.name: Shaper Apprentice
cards.text: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.
cards.flavor: The River Heralds would wreck a thousand ships to keep intruders from finding the golden city.

foreignNames.name: Wandlers Lehrling
foreignNames.text: Wandlers Lehrling hat Flugfähigkeit, solange du ein anderes Meervolk kontrollierst.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Flussherolde würden tausend Schiffe versenken, um zu verhindern, dass Eindringlinge die Goldene Stadt erreichen.

foreignNames.name: Aprendiz de moldeador
foreignNames.text: La Aprendiz de moldeador tiene la habilidad de volar mientras controles otro Tritón.
foreignNames.flavor: Los Heraldos del Río son capaces de estrellar mil barcos contra las rocas para impedir que los intrusos encuentren la ciudad dorada.

foreignNames.name: Apprentie modeleuse
foreignNames.text: L'Apprentie modeleuse a le vol tant que vous contrôlez un autre ondin.
foreignNames.flavor: Les Hérauts de l'onde sont prêts à provoquer des milliers de naufrages pour empêcher les intrus de trouver la cité d'or.

foreignNames.name: Apprendista Plasmatrice
foreignNames.text: L'Apprendista Plasmatrice ha volare fintanto che controlli un altro Tritone.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli Araldi del Fiume sono disposti a far naufragare mille navi pur di impedire agli intrusi di trovare la città dorata.

foreignNames.name: 見習い形成師
foreignNames.text: あなたが他のマーフォークをコントロールしているかぎり、見習い形成師は飛行を持つ。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 侵入者が黄金都市を見つけないように、川守りは船を何千隻でも沈め続けるつもりだ。

foreignNames.name: 변형술사 견습생
foreignNames.text: 당신이 다른 인어를 조종하는 한 변형술사 견습생은 비행을 가진다.
foreignNames.flavor: 강 전령들은 침입자들이 황금 도시를 찾지 못하게 만들기 위해서라면 천 척의 배라도 난파시킬 것이다.

foreignNames.name: Aprendiz de Moldador
foreignNames.text: Aprendiz de Moldador terá voar enquanto você controlar outro Tritão.
foreignNames.flavor: Os Arautos do Rio afundariam mil navios para impedir que intrusos encontrassem a cidade dourada.

foreignNames.name: Начинающая Заклинательница
foreignNames.text: Начинающая Заклинательница имеет Полет, пока вы контролируете другого Мерфолка.
foreignNames.flavor: Речные Вестники готовы потопить тысячу кораблей, лишь бы чужеземцы не нашли золотой город.

foreignNames.name: 塑形师学徒
foreignNames.text: 只要你操控另一个人鱼，塑形师学徒便具有飞行异能。
foreignNames.flavor: 纵使沉船千艘，川流使也要阻止入侵者找到黄金城。

foreignNames.name: 塑形師學徒
foreignNames.text: 只要你操控另一個人魚，塑形師學徒便具有飛行異能。
foreignNames.flavor: 縱使沉船千艘，川流使

cards.originalText: Shaper Apprentice has flying as long as you control another Merfolk.

cards.name: Shipwreck Looter
cards.text: Raid — When Shipwreck Looter enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
cards.flavor: One pirate's wreck is another's reward.

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Schiffswrack-Plünderin
foreignNames.text: Überfall — Wenn die Schiffswrack-Plünderin ins Spiel kommt und falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast, kannst du eine Karte ziehen. Falls du dies tust, wirf eine Karte ab.
foreignNames.flavor: „Des einen Piraten Wrack ist des anderen Piraten Lohn."

foreignNames.name: Saqueadora de naufragios
foreignNames.text: Incursión — Cuando la Saqueadora de naufragios entre al campo de batalla, si atacaste con una criatura este turno, puedes robar una carta. Si lo haces, descarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: La miseria de un pirata es el botín de otro.

foreignNames.name: Détrousseuse des épaves
foreignNames.text: Saccage — Quand la Détrousseuse des épaves arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, vous pouvez piocher une carte. Si vous faites ainsi, défaussez-vous d'une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Le naufrage d'un pirate en enrichit un autre.

foreignNames.name: Saccheggiatrice dei Relitti
foreignNames.text: Incursione — Quando la Saccheggiatrice dei Relitti entra nel campo di battaglia, se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, puoi pescare una carta. Se lo fai, scarta una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Il naufragio di un pirata fa la fortuna del prossimo.

foreignNames.name: 難破船あさり
foreignNames.text: 強襲 ― 難破船あさりが戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していた場合、あなたはカードを１枚引いてもよい。そうしたなら、カード１枚を捨てる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 海賊の難破は他人の稼ぎ。

foreignNames.name: 난파선 약탈자
foreignNames.text: 습격 — 난파선 약탈자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면, 당신은 카드 한 장을 뽑을 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 카드 한 장을 버린다.

cards.name: Siren Lookout
cards.text:
Flying
When Siren Lookout enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

cards.name: Siren Stormtamer
cards.text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.
cards.flavor: He's the calm that hides the coming storm.

rulings.text: Siren Stormtamer’s activated ability can target a spell or ability that has multiple targets, as long as at least one of those targets is you or a creature you control.

If the creature you control targeted by the target spell or ability leaves the battlefield, that spell or ability is no longer a legal target for Siren Stormtamer’s ability. On the other hand, if that targeted creature becomes an illegal target for the target spell but remains on the battlefield under your control, the target spell or ability is still a legal target for Siren Stormtamer’s ability.

cards.name: Siren's Ruse
cards.text: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If a Pirate was exiled this way, draw a card.
cards.flavor: Deception and misdirection are the heart of the pirate's arsenal.

rulings.text: Once the exiled creature returns, it’s considered a new object with no relation to the object that it was. Auras attached to the exiled creature will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Equipment attached to the exiled creature will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled creature will cease to exist.
The returned creature won’t be the target of any spells or abilities that targeted it before. Any spells that don’t target it, such as Star of Extinction, will still affect it.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.

You’ll draw a card if the creature was a Pirate as it was exiled, even if it doesn’t return to the battlefield (most likely because it’s a token) or if it returns to the battlefield but isn’t a Pirate anymore (most likely because it’s copying something else).

cards.name: Spell Swindle
cards.text: Counter target spell. Create X Treasure tokens, where X is that spell's mana value. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

rulings.text: For spells with {X} in their mana costs, use the value chosen for X to determine the spell's mana value.
You may target a spell that can't be countered. When Spell Swindle resolves, the target spell will be unaffected, but you'll still get Treasures.

foreignNames.name: Zauberschwindel
foreignNames.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Erzeuge X farblose Schatz-Artefaktspielsteine, wobei X gleich den umgewandelten Manakosten des Zauberspruchs ist. Sie haben „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."

foreignNames.name: Rechazo próspero
foreignNames.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Crea X fichas de artefacto Tesoro incoloras, donde X es el coste de maná convertido de ese hechizo. Tienen "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná".

foreignNames.name: Flouerie de sort
foreignNames.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Créez X jetons d'artefact incolore Trésor, X étant le coût converti de mana de ce sort. Ils ont « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. »

foreignNames.name: Raggiro Magico
foreignNames.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Crea X pedine artefatto Tesoro incolori, dove X è il costo di mana convertito di quella magia. Hanno "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana".

foreignNames.name: 呪文詐欺
foreignNames.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。無色の宝物・アーティファクト・トークンをＸ個生成する。Ｘはその呪文の点数で見たマナ・コストに等しい。それらは「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つ。

foreignNames.name: 주문 사취
foreignNames.text: 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 무색 보물 마법물체 토큰 X개를 만든다. X는 그 주문의 전환마나비용이다. 그 토큰들은 "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다."를 가진다.

foreignNames.name: Logro Mágico
foreignNames.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Crie X fichas de artefato incolor do tipo Tesouro, sendo X o custo de mana convertido daquela mágica. Elas têm "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."

foreignNames.name: Стянуть Заклинание
foreignNames.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Создайте X фишек бесцветного артефакта Клад, где X — конвертированная мана-стоимость того заклинания. У них есть способность «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны».

foreignNames.name: 咒语欺诈
foreignNames.text: 反击目标咒语。派出X个无色珍宝衍生神器，X为该咒语的总法术力费用。它们具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

foreignNames.name: 咒語欺詐
foreignNames.text: 反擊目標咒語。派出X個無色珍寶衍生神器，X為該咒語的總魔法力費用。它們具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。」

cards.originalText: Counter target spell. Create X colorless Treasure artifact tokens, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. They have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Storm Fleet Aerialist
cards.text:
Flying
Raid — Storm Fleet Aerialist enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you attacked this turn.
cards.flavor: "Only one thing beats the freedom of the sea: the freedom of the sky."

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Sturmflotten-Luftpiratin
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Überfall — Die Sturmflotten-Luftpiratin kommt mit einer +1/+1-Marke ins Spiel, falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast.
foreignNames.flavor: „Nur die Lüfte sind noch weiter als das Meer."

foreignNames.name: Planeadora de la Flota Tempestuosa
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Incursión — La Planeadora de la Flota Tempestuosa entra al campo de batalla con un contador +1/+1 sobre ella si atacaste con una criatura este turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Solo una cosa es mejor que la libertad del mar: la libertad del cielo".

foreignNames.name: Voltigeuse de la Flotte de la tempête
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Saccage — La Voltigeuse de la Flotte de la tempête arrive sur le champ de bataille avec un marqueur +1/+1 sur elle si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il n'y a qu'une seule chose qui surpasse la liberté sur la mer : la liberté dans les airs. »

foreignNames.name: Aquilonista della Flotta Fendiburrasca
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Incursione — L'Aquilonista della Flotta Fendiburrasca entra nel campo di battaglia con un segnalino +1/+1 se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "C'è solo una sensazione migliore della libertà del mare: la libertà del cielo."

foreignNames.name: 風雲艦隊の空中要員
foreignNames.text:
飛行
強襲 ― このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していたなら、風雲艦隊の空中要員は＋１/＋１カウンターが１個置かれた状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「公海の自由を上回るのは一つだけ。高空の自由よ。」

foreignNames.name: 스톰 선단 공중곡예사
foreignNames.text:
비행
습격 — 이 턴에 당신이 생물로 공격했다면, 스톰 선단 공중곡예사는 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 가진 채로 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: "바다의 자유로움을 이길 수 있는 건 하늘의 자유로움뿐이라구."

foreignNames.name: Aerialista da Frota da Tormenta
foreignNames.text:
Voar
Raide — Aerialista da Frota da Tormenta entra no campo de batalha com um marcador +1/+1 se você tiver atacado com uma criatura neste turno.
foreignNames.flavor: "Só tem uma coisa melhor do que a liberdade do mar: a do céu."

foreignNames.name: Летунья Штормовой Флотилии
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Набег — Летунья Штормовой Флотилии выходит на поле битвы с одним жетоном +1/+1 на ней, если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом.
foreignNames.flavor: «Свободу в море может превзойти только одно: свобода в небе».

foreignNames.name: 速腾舰队飞空盗
foreignNames.text:
飞行
突击～如果你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则速腾舰队飞空盗进战场时上面有一个+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「只有一件事比在海上自由航行更惬意：在空中自由飞翔。」

foreignNames.name: 速騰艦隊飛空盜
foreignNames.text:
飛行
突擊～如果你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則速騰艦隊飛空盜進戰場時上面有一個+1/+1指示物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「只有一件事比在海上自由航行更愜意：在空中自由飛翔。」

cards.name: Storm Fleet Spy
cards.text: Raid — When Storm Fleet Spy enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor: "They're searching in the same direction we are. And for the same thing, I'll wager."

rulings.text: Raid abilities care only that you attacked with a creature. It doesn’t matter how many creatures you attacked with, or which opponent or planeswalker controlled by an opponent those creatures attacked.

Raid abilities evaluate the entire turn to see if you attacked with a creature. That creature doesn’t have to still be on the battlefield. Similarly, the player or planeswalker it attacked doesn’t have to still be in the game or on the battlefield, respectively.

foreignNames.name: Sturmflotten-Spionin
foreignNames.text: Überfall — Wenn die Sturmflotten-Spionin ins Spiel kommt und falls du in diesem Zug mit mindestens einer Kreatur angegriffen hast, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sie haben dieselbe Richtung wie wir eingeschlagen. Ich wette, sie suchen auch dasselbe wie wir."

foreignNames.name: Espía de la Flota Tempestuosa
foreignNames.text: Incursión — Cuando la Espía de la Flota Tempestuosa entre al campo de batalla, si atacaste con una criatura este turno, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Están buscando en la misma dirección que nosotros. Y me atrevo a aventurar que quieren encontrar lo mismo".

foreignNames.name: Espionne de la Flotte de la tempête
foreignNames.text: Saccage — Quand l'Espionne de la Flotte de la tempête arrive sur le champ de bataille, si vous avez attaqué avec une créature ce tour-ci, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ils fouillent le même endroit que nous. Et je parie qu'ils cherchent la même chose. »

foreignNames.name: Spia della Flotta Fendiburrasca
foreignNames.text: Incursione — Quando la Spia della Flotta Fendiburrasca entra nel campo di battaglia, se hai attaccato con una creatura in questo turno, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Cercano nella nostra stessa direzione. E con lo stesso scopo, scommetto."

foreignNames.name: 風雲艦隊のスパイ
foreignNames.text: 強襲 ― 風雲艦隊のスパイが戦場に出たとき、このターンにあなたがクリーチャーで攻撃していた場合、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・海賊
foreignNames.flavor: 「あいつらも、こっちと同じ方向を探してるはずよ。同じ物を目指してね。賭けてもいいわ。」

foreignNames.name: 스톰 선단 첩보원
foreignNames.text: 습격 — 스톰 선단 첩보원이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 이 턴에 생물로 공격했다면, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreignNames.flavor: "그들도 우리와 같은 방향을 수색하고 있어. 우리와 같은 것을 찾고 있는 게 분명해, 내기하지."

foreignNames.name: Espiã da Frota da Tormenta
foreignNames.text: Raide — Quando Espiã da Frota da Tormenta entra no campo de batalha, se você atacou com uma criatura neste turno, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eles estão procurando na mesma direção que nós. E pela mesma coisa, aposto."

foreignNames.name: Шпионка Штормовой Флотилии
foreignNames.text: Набег — Когда Шпионка Штормовой Флотилии выходит на поле битвы, если в этом ходу вы атаковали существом, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: «Они копают в том же направлении, что и мы. И могу поспорить, что и ищут то же самое».

foreignNames.name: 速腾舰队探子
foreignNames.text: 突击～当速腾舰队探子进战场时，若你于本回合中曾以生物攻击，则抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他们搜寻的方向跟我们一样。我敢打赌他们要找的东西也跟我们一样。」

foreignNames.name: 速騰艦隊探子
foreignNames.text: 突擊～當速騰艦隊探子進戰場時，若你於本回合中曾以生物攻擊，則抽一張牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「他們搜尋的方向跟我們一樣。我敢打賭他們要找的東西也跟我們一樣。」

cards.originalText: Raid — When Storm Fleet Spy enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Storm Sculptor
cards.text:
Storm Sculptor can't be blocked.
When Storm Sculptor enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: In his hands, the wind can become a weapon or a means of escape.

rulings.text: Storm Sculptor’s last ability doesn’t target the creature you’ll return to hand. You choose one as the ability resolves. No player may take actions between the time you choose a creature to return and the time you do so.
Storm Sculptor’s last ability isn’t optional. If Storm Sculptor is the only creature you control when the ability resolves, you’ll have to return it to its owner’s hand.

foreignNames.name: Sturmwindformer
foreignNames.text:
Der Sturmwindformer kann nicht geblockt werden.
Wenn der Sturmwindformer ins Spiel kommt, bringe eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Wind ist sein kampfbereiter Gefährte, der ihm stets den Rücken freihält.

foreignNames.name: Esculpetormentas
foreignNames.text:
El Esculpetormentas no puede ser bloqueado.
Cuando el Esculpetormentas entre al campo de batalla, regresa una criatura que controlas a la mano de su propietario.
foreignNames.flavor: En sus manos, el viento se convierte en un arma o en un método de huida.

foreignNames.name: Sculpteur de tempête
foreignNames.text:
Le Sculpteur de tempête ne peut pas être bloqué.
Quand le Sculpteur de tempête arrive sur le champ de bataille, renvoyez une créature que vous contrôlez dans la main de son propriétaire.
foreignNames.flavor: Entre ses mains, le vent peut devenir une arme ou un moyen d'évasion.

foreignNames.name: Scultore di Burrasche
foreignNames.text:
Lo Scultore di Burrasche non può essere bloccato.
Quando lo Scultore di Burrasche entra nel campo di battaglia, fai tornare una creatura che controlli in mano al suo proprietario.
foreignNames.flavor: Nelle sue mani, il vento può diventare un'arma o una via di fuga.

foreignNames.name: 嵐を変容する者
foreignNames.text:
嵐を変容する者はブロックされない。
嵐を変容する者が戦場に出たとき、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体をオーナーの手札に戻す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: その手にかかると、風は武器にも逃げ道にもなる。

foreignNames.name: 폭풍 조각가
foreignNames.text:
폭풍 조각가는 방어될 수 없다.
폭풍 조각가가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다.
foreignNames.flavor: 바람은 그의 손에서 무기가 될 수도, 아니면 탈출 수단이 될 수도 있다.

foreignNames.name: Escultor de Tempestades
foreignNames.text:
Escultor de Tempestades não pode ser bloqueado.
Quando Escultor de Tempestades entrar no campo de batalha, devolva uma criatura que você controla para a mão de seu dono.
foreignNames.flavor: Nas mãos dele, o vento pode se tornar uma arma ou uma via de fuga.

foreignNames.name: Ваятель Бури
foreignNames.text:
Ваятель Бури не может быть заблокирован.
Когда Ваятель Бури выходит на поле битвы, верните существо под вашим контролем в руку его владельца.
foreignNames.flavor: В его руках ветер может стать и оружием, и способом побега.

foreignNames.name: 风暴塑师
foreignNames.text:
风暴塑师不能被阻挡。
当风暴塑师进战场时，将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 在他的手中，风既能成为武器，也能成为脱逃的手段。

foreignNames.name: 風暴塑師
foreignNames.text:
風暴塑師不能被阻擋。
當風暴塑師進戰場時，將一個由你操控的生物移回其擁有者手上。
foreignNames.flavor: 在他的手中，風既能成為武器，也能成為脫逃的手段。

cards.text: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.

rulings.text: Tempest Caller’s ability targets only the player. Creatures with hexproof that player controls will be tapped as that ability resolves.

foreignNames.name: Unwetter-Rufer
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Unwetter-Rufer ins Spiel kommt, tappe alle Kreaturen, die ein Gegner deiner Wahl kontrolliert.

foreignNames.text: Cuando el Invocador de tempestades entre al campo de batalla, gira todas las criaturas que controla el oponente objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Yo soy la tormenta".

foreignNames.name: Meneur de tempête
foreignNames.text: Quand le Meneur de tempête arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez toutes les créatures que l'adversaire ciblé contrôle.
foreignNames.flavor: « Je suis la tempête. »

foreignNames.name: Convocatore di Tempeste
foreignNames.text: Quando il Convocatore di Tempeste entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa tutte le creature controllate da un avversario bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Io sono la tempesta."

foreignNames.text: 大嵐呼びが戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしているクリーチャーをすべてタップする。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード

foreignNames.text: 폭풍 소환사가 전장에 들어올 때, 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대가 조종하는 모든 생물을 탭한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내가 곧 폭풍이다."

foreignNames.name: Convocador de Tempestades
foreignNames.text: Quando Convocador de Tempestades entrar no campo de batalha, vire todas as criaturas que o oponente alvo controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Eu sou a tempestade."

foreignNames.name: Призыватель Штормов
foreignNames.text: Когда Призыватель Штормов выходит на поле битвы, поверните все существа под контролем целевого оппонента.
foreignNames.flavor: «Я и есть шторм».

foreignNames.name: 暴雨唤师
foreignNames.text: 当暴雨唤师进战场时，横置由目标对手操控的所有生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「我就是风暴。」

foreignNames.name: 暴雨喚師

foreignNames.flavor: 「我就是風暴。」

cards.originalText: When Tempest Caller enters the battlefield, tap all creatures target opponent controls.

cards.name: Watertrap Weaver
cards.text: When Watertrap Weaver enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor: The river is a powerful friend.

rulings.text: Watertrap Weaver’s ability can target a creature that’s already tapped. That creature won’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

foreignNames.name: Wasserfallenweberin
foreignNames.text: Wenn die Wasserfallenweberin ins Spiel kommt, tappe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die ein Gegner kontrolliert. Die Kreatur enttappt nicht während des nächsten Enttappsegments ihres Beherrschers.
foreignNames.flavor: Der Fluss ist ein mächtiger Verbündeter.

foreignNames.name: Tejedora de trampa acuática
foreignNames.text: Cuando la Tejedora de trampa acuática entre al campo de batalla, gira la criatura objetivo que controla un oponente. Esa criatura no se endereza durante el próximo paso de enderezar de su controlador.
foreignNames.flavor: El río es un aliado poderoso.

foreignNames.name: Tisseuse de piège aquatique
foreignNames.text: Quand la Tisseuse de piège aquatique arrive sur le champ de bataille, engagez une créature ciblée qu'un adversaire contrôle. Cette créature ne se dégage pas pendant la prochaine étape de dégagement de son contrôleur.
foreignNames.flavor: La rivière est une puissante alliée.

foreignNames.name: Tessitrice di Idrotrappole
foreignNames.text: Quando la Tessitrice di Idrotrappole entra nel campo di battaglia, TAPpa una creatura bersaglio controllata da un avversario. Quella creatura non STAPpa durante il prossimo STAP del suo controllore.
foreignNames.flavor: Il fiume è un alleato potente.

foreignNames.name: 水罠織り
foreignNames.text: 水罠織りが戦場に出たとき、対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それをタップする。そのクリーチャーは、それのコントローラーの次のアンタップ・ステップにアンタップしない。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — マーフォーク・ウィザード
foreignNames.flavor: 川は力ある友。

foreignNames.name: 물덫 방직공
foreignNames.text: 물덫 방직공이 전장에 들어올 때, 상대가 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 탭한다. 그 생물은 조종자의 다음 언탭단에 언탭되지 않는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 강은 강력한 친구다.

foreignNames.name: Tecedora de Armadilhas Aquáticas
foreignNames.text: Quando Tecedora de Armadilhas Aquáticas entrar no campo de batalha, vire a criatura alvo que um oponente controla. Aquela criatura não é desvirada durante a próxima etapa de desvirar de seu controlador.
foreignNames.flavor: O rio é um amigo poderoso.

foreignNames.name: Плетельщица Водяных Ловушек
foreignNames.text: Когда Плетельщица Водяных Ловушек выходит на поле битвы, поверните целевое существо под контролем оппонента. То существо не разворачивается во время следующего шага разворота контролирующего его игрока.
foreignNames.flavor: Река — могущественный друг.

foreignNames.name: 水阱织师
foreignNames.text: 当水阱织师进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。
